Bike Attack Race 2: Death games Moto Shooting free

Bike Attack Race Stunt Fight game is an ultimate addition to stunt bike racing games 2018. Get ready to join thrilling stunt bike attack racing game adventure and feel the real thrill of crazy stunt race in endless manner. Play the most popular super bike racing game while enjoying the astonishing and detailed view of incredible motorcycle racing tracks with extreme hurdles and experience the most realistic bike simulation ever. Dodge the highway traffic while fighting with the crazy bike riders and win this insane bike race in no time. The biker fight game is very addictive and the stunt racing challenges are quite real as you not only have to race but also have to fight with rivals. Enjoy the combat racing games mission while riding your trail bike and reach the finish line as soon as possible. Cross the difficult hurdles and jump over the incredible ramps while performing crazy stunts like a real stunt master. So, brace yourself for the real bike attack racing game and enjoy this crazy stunt bike race.

The bike attack race stunt fight allows you to boost your super bike riding skills by giving you real challenging highway racing missions. Strap your helmet for the breathtaking and adventurous superbike championship rally which is being held on the tracks of city highways. Whizz through the extreme traffic and beat the road fighters while riding your traffic bike at lightning speed. You have variety of weapons to take down the rivals e.g. bullets, axes and bats. Each fighter has a health bar over their head which show their remaining health. You can use protective shields to save your health from the opponent’s attacks. Avoid crashing with road boundaries and other deadly obstacles to reach the finish line fast.

Boost your heavy bike simulator by tapping the nitro button and beat all the rivals instantly. Kick and punch the rivals to take them down and deviate their attention from the highway racing tracks. Enjoy the extreme axe fighting while enjoying this free bike race and do crazy back flips on incredible ramps. You can buy pistols, shot guns and baseball bat from the game store using cash rewards. So, gear up to punch the rivals and play this adrenaline fueled stunt racing games like a champ. The bike attack race stunt fight game is full of thrilling shooting action and it will surely make you addicted.


 
How to Play:

• Tilt your device to steer the trail bike simulator.
• Tap Bat, Axe, Kick and Punch buttons to beat your opponent’s dirt bikes.
• Use nitrous button to boost up your superbike simulator.

Top Features of Bike Attack Race Stunt Fight:

• Two types of heavy bikes to ride.
• A wide game garage to choose heavy bikes, costumes and weapons.
• Weapons like pistol, shot guns, axes and bats.
• Most realistic stunt bike simulation.
• Real deadly bike attack race.
• Ultra-smooth quality game play and realistic controls.
• Incredible ramps to perform crazy stunts.
• Play this bike racing game without internet.
• Free to download.
